successBanner.title: Success
successBanner.message: Other Motion task has been cancelled. If you have made a mistake, please email Inbound Ops Supervisor for any changes.

failBanner.title: Warning
failBanner.message: Error FOIA request task has not been cancelled

teamFailBanner.title: Error
teamFailBanner.message: Task action could not be completed. Please try again at a later time or contact the Help Desk (Error code: %s).

completeBanner.title: Complete
completeBanner.message: %s task has been marked complete. If you have made a mistake, please email %s for any changes.

completeFailBanner.title: Complete Failed
completeFailBanner.message: Task unable to be completed or assigned.
